subsection_analysis.document: South of France - Tips and Tricks.pdf
subsection_analysis.refined_text: Whether you're traveling solo, with kids, or in a group, this guide will help you make the most of your trip. Conclusion Packing for a trip to the South of France involves considering the season, planned activities, and the needs of both adults and children.

subsection_analysis.document: South of France - Things to Do.pdf
subsection_analysis.refined_text: Use this guide to plan your trip and make the most of everything this beautiful region has to offer. This guide will take you through a variety of activities and must-see attractions to help you plan an unforgettable trip.
This guide will take you through the histories of major cities, famous historical sites, and other points of interest to help you plan an enriching and unforgettable trip.
